title: Artist/Author, Painter/Poet: Illustrated Books of Poetry
description: Illustrated poetry books from the Ryerson and Burnham Libraries demonstrate the relationship between artist and poet. Images by artists such as Ernst Ludwig Kirchner, Joan Miró, and Man Ray include illustrations of poetic narratives and evocative abstractions. Artist/Author, Painter/Poet can be seen Monday through Saturday during museum hours.
